tokenism.translation[0].definitions[0].d: actions that are intended to make people think that an organization deals fairly with people or problems, when in fact it does not
tokenism.translation[1].definitions[0].d: when an organization includes a representative of a particular group such as women, black people etc in an activity or position only in order to give an appearance of fairness
tokenism.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Appointing her to the committee strikes me as little more than tokenism.
